attributes.additional_details: This a petition to prevent the highly offensive and disrespectful 'Muslims Against Crusades' from protesting, chanting through the 2 minute silence and burning of the Poppy which is a powerful tribute to our fallen service men and women on the 11.11.11.11. Please prevent this absolutely discussing insult to the men and woman that died to allow us to be free and for them to be so ignorant. Please do the right thing.
